sentences.english: Eg: Gambling brings him to ruin.

sentences.chinese: 他幸災樂禍地看著他的對手身敗名裂。

sentences.english: Of course, they will be broken in the end.
sentences.chinese: 當然，最終的結果就是身敗名裂。

sentences.english: When the bank broke , many people were ruined.
sentences.chinese: 當銀行破產時，許多人跟着身敗名裂。

sentences.english: His downfall was caused by gambling and drink.
sentences.chinese: 他的身敗名裂是由賭博和酗酒造成的。

sentences.english: The scandal finally led to his downfall.
sentences.chinese: 這樁醜聞最終使他身敗名裂。

sentences.english: Lin was subsequently fired, his reputation left in tatters
sentences.chinese: 林嘉祥隨後被開除，身敗名裂。
她把自己搞得身敗名裂。

sentences.english: His treacherous actions brought down ruin on himself.
sentences.chinese: 他的背叛行徑使他身敗名裂。

sentences.english: I'm proud of Romania for producing such an infamous character.
sentences.chinese: 爲羅馬尼亞如此身敗名裂的角色感到驕傲。
